sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya senang melukis di waktu luang.
english translation: I enjoy painting in my free time.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia terus memandang langit yang indah.
english translation: He keeps looking at the beautiful sky.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong memasukkan kunci ke dalam lubang.
english translation: Please insert the key into the hole.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kami siap membantu Anda.
english translation: We are ready to help you.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia suka membawa buku ke mana pun dia pergi.
english translation: She likes to bring books wherever she goes.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Jangan membuang waktu Anda dengan hal-hal yang tidak penting.
english translation: Don't waste your time on unimportant things.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong membungkus hadiah ini dengan indah.
english translation: Please wrap this gift beautifully.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kami membutuhkan bantuanmu segera.
english translation: We need your help urgently.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Perusahaan tersebut akan memecat karyawan yang tidak bekerja dengan baik.
english translation: The company will fire employees who do not perform well.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya memiliki dua anjing peliharaan.
english translation: I have two pet dogs.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia dipilih untuk memimpin tim tersebut.
english translation: She was chosen to lead the team.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Bisakah saya meminjam bukumu selama seminggu?
english translation: Can I borrow your book for a week?

sentence in indonesian using the words: Pisahkan baju putih dan baju berwarna sebelum mencucinya.
english translation: Separate the white clothes from the colored ones before washing them.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia menjual produknya secara online untuk memperjualbelikannya.
english translation: He sells his products online to buy and sell them.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Jangan pernah memukul orang lain.
english translation: Never hit another person.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong menambah gula ke dalam adonan.
english translation: Please add sugar to the dough.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya suka menambahkan keju pada makanan saya.
english translation: I like to add cheese to my food.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Ibu saya menanam bunga di taman depan rumah.
english translation: My mother plants flowers in the front yard.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Silakan menandatangani formulir ini di bagian bawah.
english translation: Please sign this form at the bottom.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong menaruh buku itu di rak.
english translation: Please put the book on the shelf.
